name: Bomb Time
description:
This game took about four days to make, and, as a beginner bogged down in errors, they were excruciating. Lo and behold, a small but playable game! Stay tuned for an update later today (July 4); I'll try to add a quick scoring system to it.

Second game I've ever made, first one in Unity. The other was Bitsy. That all comes out to very little experience.

Anyway, have fun with this little bit!
